newsitem.title: USA: Guilford Mills to redeem 6.0 pct debentures.
newsitem.headline: Guilford Mills to redeem 6.0 pct debentures.

text.p: Guilford Mills Inc said Wednesday its board had approved the redemption of the company's outstanding six percent convertible subordinated debentures due September 15, 2012.
The company said it had debentures outstanding in the aggregate principal amount of $66.18 million as of June 24.
The debentures will be redeemed August 8 at 100.6 percent of principal plus interest accrued up to, but not including, the redemption date.
The company said holders of the debentures have the right to convert them into common stock at a conversion price of $19.67 per share. Conversion rights terminate on July 29, it said.
Shares of Guilford were up 3/4 at 20-1/8.
